Uses of Package
ussr.model

Packages that use ussr.model
ussr.comm An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets. 
ussr.model An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller. 
ussr.physics An abstract model of a physics engine, serves as the interface between physics-engine independent classes and the physics engine. 
ussr.physics.jme A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine). 
ussr.physics.jme.actuators Provides a collection of actuators for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.physics.jme.connectors Provides a collection of connectors for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.physics.jme.robots Robot implementations for the ussr.physics.jme simulation implementation. 
ussr.physics.jme.sensors Provides a collection of sensors for the JME physics engine implementation. 
ussr.robotbuildingblocks Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios. 
ussr.samples.atron Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.atron.natives ATRON examples based on native (implemented in C) controllers 
ussr.samples.atron.network   
ussr.samples.mtran Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot 
ussr.samples.odin Simulation examples based on the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot. 
ussr.samples.white   
ussr.sandbox Sandbox for experimentation 
 

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.comm
Entity
          Abstract class defining common behavior for entities in the simulator, namely the ability to have properties (strings with a key-value structure) defined on the entity.
Module
          A module is the basic unit from which the modular robot is built.
 

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.model
Actuator
          An abstract actuator for a modular robot: can actuate two module components relative to each other.
Connector
          An abstract connector for a modular robot: can connect to other connectors, provide information about other connectors available for connection, and can provide information about its connection status.
Controller
          Interface the simulator expects user-defined controllers to implement, allowing hardware to be associated with the controller and the controller to be started in its own thread.
Entity
          Abstract class defining common behavior for entities in the simulator, namely the ability to have properties (strings with a key-value structure) defined on the entity.
Module
          A module is the basic unit from which the modular robot is built.
NativeControllerProvider
          Controller implementation for NativeController
PhysicsActuator
          A physics engine representation of an actuator: can actuate two module components relative to each other.
PhysicsSensor
          A physics engine representation of a sensor: can read the value of the sensor and allows the corresponding model to be set.
Sensor
          An abstract sensor for a modular robot: can sense a value
 

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.physics
Connector
          An abstract connector for a modular robot: can connect to other connectors, provide information about other connectors available for connection, and can provide information about its connection status.
Module
          A module is the basic unit from which the modular robot is built.

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.robotbuildingblocks
Controller
          Interface the simulator expects user-defined controllers to implement, allowing hardware to be associated with the controller and the controller to be started in its own thread.
 

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.samples.atron
Controller
          Interface the simulator expects user-defined controllers to implement, allowing hardware to be associated with the controller and the controller to be started in its own thread.
ControllerImpl
          Abstract class providing a default implementation of the Controller interface.
Module
          A module is the basic unit from which the modular robot is built.
 

Classes in ussr.model used by ussr.samples.atron.natives
Controller
          Interface the simulator expects user-defined controllers to implement, allowing hardware to be associated with the controller and the controller to be started in its own thread.
NativeController
          A controller with a native implementation, bridged to a controller implementing the NativeControllerProvider interface.
